pullrequest.title: Update SRC sim instance docker network

content.raw:
Couldn't the OCU use a static IP outside of that range? I think using two rules would prevent that.

```
# Allow traffic from the field computer (assuming it is 192.168.2.2)
iptables -I INPUT --src 192.168.2.2 -j ACCEPT
# ignore all other traffic from this subnet
iptables -A INPUT --src 192.168.2.0/24 -j DROP
```
